message.content:
{"id": "13620", "title": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with a large amount of white space", "description": "", "OB": "When viewing the Java Source Attachment Preference Page, I observed that the text has excessive white space.", "EB": "The Java Source Attachment Preference Page should display the text without any unnecessary white space.", "SR": "To fix this issue, the vertical alignment of the info label in the middle of the dialog should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING. To reproduce the issue: 
1) Load a project from the repository. 
2) Select a source folder. 
3) Open the Properties dialog. 
4) Select the Java Source Attachment section. 
5) Observe the info label that appears in the middle of the dialog."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
